text:
Proda | Frontend, backend, full stack | London | Full-time | ONSITE | 50-75k + equity doe.

Proda (formerly Trivium Real Estate) is building an AI-powered tool that allows commercial real estate entites to understand and better use their data.

We have multiple investment firms and brokers trying out our product, including some big names: https://bdaily.co.uk/articles/2018/11/01/proptech-startup-pa...

Our sales pipeline is miles ahead of our development and we're looking to grow the team to deliver more feature our customers.

We're based on London's south bank and you'll be working with a team of supportive, highly-skilled engineers.

We're more interested in a willingness and ability to learn than what you currently know. But in case your interested in the stack we're using:

  - Haskell
  - Elm
  - PostgreSQL
  - Python / scikit-learn
  - AWS
  - Automated Testing and CI/CD.
Contact us at https://proda.ai or info@proda.ai
